title: Enhancing Teaching Practice Competency: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)-Based Science Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts through multiple modalities in accordance with UDL (Universal Design for Learning) principles.
Through project-based team activities, learners design and execute scientific problem-solving processes and create digital portfolios of their outcomes.
Learners revise project deliverables based on peer feedback and achieve measurable performance metrics during final presentations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
